basics.name: Dr. Sruthi Prasood Usha Ph.D.
basics.label: Humboldt Researcher | Research Scientist
basics.summary: Revolutionizing In-home Breath Profiling with Smart Sensor Innovation

work.name: Bioinspired Materials & Biosensor Technologies, Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel
work.summary: Developement of an optical chemosensory smart sensing platform that supports the idea of in-home respiratory health care.

work.name: Bioinspired Materials & Biosensor Technologies, Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel
work.summary: Development of a miniaturized sensor system for continuous soil-nutrient monitoring based on the integration of a lab-on-a-chip microfluidic cartridge with an optoelectronic detection unit.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
